elements.heading: Your beauty tech's number #1 spot.
elements.content: Whether you need a lash tech, make-up guru or wig installer - the Noir Discover has it all. We've made it easier than ever to find a service for all your beauty needs.

elements.heading: Love your neighbour.
elements.content: Supporting a local business is always better. Noir Discover makes it easier than ever to cut out the middle-man and directly support a local service.

elements.heading: Location, location, location.
elements.content: Location is everything when it comes to business. Listing on the Noir Directive means that your clients can connect to you quickly.

elements.heading: We're for everyone.
elements.content: Noir caters for all sizes of business. From large-scale corporate to instagram-based services.

elements.heading: Set it, then forget it.
elements.content: Being a beauty tech means long hours and busy schedules. That's why we've made listing on the Noir Directive a quick and rewarding process! Just set it up once and enjoy an increase in bookings.
